question: How are GNU and Linux related?

terminology.definition: a collection of free software; the name is a recursive acronym - GNU's Not Unix!
terminology.source: Learn Linux Shell Scripting Fundamentals of Bash 4.4

terminology.definition: generic term for all open-source operating systems based on the linux kernel
terminology.source: Learn Linux Shell Scripting Fundamentals of Bash 4.4

answer: most Linux operating systems rely heavily on GNU project utilities

comment.what: for example, BASH is a GNU program
comment.who: Learn Linux Shell Scripting Fundamentals of Bash 4.4

comment.what: because of this, Linux operating systems are referred to by some as GNU/Linux
comment.who: Learn Linux Shell Scripting Fundamentals of Bash 4.4

subgroup.hint: Explains the association between gnu and linux
